thread.title_full: WITH HEAVY HEARTS THE FAMILY O...

title: WITH HEAVY HEARTS THE FAMILY O...
text:
With heavy hearts the family of Joe wishes to announce his peaceful passing on May 23, 2024 at University Hospital. Joe was born in Budapest, Hungary to Magda and Sandor Weis. After the Hungarian Revolution in 1956, Joe left Hungary and arrived in Canada in March of 1958. Once he joined the Canadian Army he ended up in London, Ontario and met Barbara Ruppe at a dance at the German Canadian Club. They were married on September 28, 1963. Son Martin and daughter Susanne were born in 1964. In 2023 Barbara and Joe celebrated 60 years of happy marriage. During their time together they travelled to a total of 42 countries – always happy to come home to London.
Joe is survived by his wife Barbara; son Martin (Carey Yates) and daughter Susanne Russell (the late Glenn); grandchildren Jessica Russell, Stephanie Russell (Keith Queen), Alisha Weis (Marc Edwards), Jocelyn Weis (Derek Blaney), Thalia Weis (Andrew Schneider), Ryan Smale, Lindsay Smale, and Holly Smale; great-grandchildren Aiden Collins, Owen Collins, Emmaleigh Collins, Sophia Shushkewich, Simon Blaney, Heath Weis, Mila Weis and Claire Edwards.
Thank you to all the medical teams at Univeristy Hospital and the home care teams during the last difficult year. Interment at Mount Pleasant Cemetery, 303 Riverside Drive, London, on Monday, May 27 at 1 p.m.
Rest in peace dearest Joe.
www.HarrisFuneralHome.ca
Published online May 25, 2024

Plant a tree: How does it work
When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.
An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.
After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.
Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.
Tree Planting Timeline
Orders placed in:
January - May
Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.
June - December
Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
